The International School of Moscow Part of The British Schools Group
Dear Parents,
HAPPY NEW YEAR!
Hopefully you all had a wonderful break and are looking forward to Term Two!
Last term everyone worked hard to ensure a great start to the year. Well done to all!
It has been fantastic to see how the children have bonded in their respective classes as well as bonding as a whole year group.
Last term we had some awesome events that everyone enjoyed such as: Book week, Swimming Gala, Movember, ISM’s Got Talent, the end of term Christmas Carol Service as well as the Year 3 Production (which was excellent).
Spring Term Dates (12 weeks / 60 days)
Monday 13th January - First day back.
Friday 17th January – Interhouse ‘Capture the Flag’ begins.
Tuesday 28th and Wednesday 29th January - ASAs begin
Monday 17th February – Friday 21st February – International Week
Friday 21st February - Mid Year Reports
Monday 24th February – Friday 28th February - Half term (return Monday 3rd March)
Wednesday 5th March - World Maths Day
Tuesday 18th and Wednesday 19th March - Last days of ASAs
Tuesday 4th and Wednesday 5thth March - Parent-teacher Consultations 4-6pm
Friday 11th April Last day of term - Noon finish
All Year 2 class assemblies will start at 9.35am.
Friday 31st January– 2A Class assembly
Friday 7th February – 2B Class assembly
Friday 14st February – 2C Class assembly
It was fantastic to see how smart the children looked in their uniforms last term, please continue to help us with this. We are all looking forward to Term Two being just as much fun and as productive as Term One. Let’s all do our best and work hard to achieve this! 2C were the uniform winner in term 1. Please click here to download the Year 2 curriculum overview.
Finally, many thanks to all parents who have helped to make this academic year start so well.
Yours Sincerely,
The Year 2 Team
Miss Mullally (Teacher 2A) Mrs. Mason (AT)
Mr. Chapman (Teacher 2B) Miss Ivanova (AT)
Mrs. Arora (Teacher 2C) Mr. Pilles (AT)
Mr. Charlton (Year 1, 2 & 3 Phase Leader)
